SearchWipActHistory.MainSQL: SELECT DURABLE_ID , LOT_ID , TRANSACTION_CODE , TRANSACTION_DATE , PROCESS_CODE , ROUTE_ID , LANE_ID , PROCESS_CODE , FACTORY_AREA_ID , FORM_FORC_MANL_PORT , SMPL_ISS_TYPE_CODE , EQUIPMENT_ID , LOT_DETAIL_STATUS_CODE , LOT_STATUS_CODE , TRANSACTION_USER_ID FROM TB_EGN_LOT_HIST WHERE 1=1 AND TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(@StartTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(@EndTime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') +Option1 +Option2 AND ROWNUM < 200 order by TRANSACTION_DATE desc
